XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <Route Url="/getfilelist" Method="GET" Call="Fileserver.JSON:FileListToJSON"/> <Route Url="/requestfile/:fileid" Method="GET" Call="Fileserver.JSON:RequestFile"/> <Route Url="/download/:downloadid" Method="GET" Call="Fileserver.JSON:DownloadFile"/> <Route Url="/upload" Method="POST" Call="Fileserver.JSON:UploadFile"/> <Route Url="/files" Method="GET" Call="csp.files:OnPage"/>
<Route Url="/test" Method="GET" Call="Test"/> </Routes>

Property.name: DateCreated
Property.Description: Creation date of download in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format.

Property.name: DateActiveUntil
Property.Description: Download (as in file transfer) may be initiatyed by a client until this date in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format.

Property.name: IP
Property.Description: IP of a client initiated creation of download.

Property.name: DownloadID
Property.Description: Random letter combination. NOT a private key.

Property.name: DownloadCount
Property.Description: Number of filetransfers occured for this download.

Method.name: DownloadIDGenerate
Method.Description: Generate and set DownloadID. Generates random upper case string, from 64 to 96 symbols
Method.Implementation:
set temp = "" set length = 64 + $Random(33) for { set temp = temp _ $Char(65 + $Random(25)) quit:$Length(temp)>length }
set ..DownloadID = temp Quit $$$OK

Class.name: Fileserver.File
Class.Description: Represents one file served on fileserver.

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: Name of the file (without path, but with extension).

Property.name: Size
Property.Description: Size of the file in bytes.

Property.name: DateCreated
Property.Description: Date of creation of the file in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format.

Property.name: DateModified
Property.Description: Date of modification of the file in YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format.

Method.name: AddDir
Method.Description:
Add files from directory dir to fileserver.
rec - recursive: 1 - to add subfolders, 0 - so skip them.

Method.name: AddFile
Method.Description:
Add file to fileserver.
file - full filename with path.

Method.name: DelDir
Method.Description:
Delete files from directory dir to fileserver.
rec - recursive: 1 - to delete subfolders, 0 - so skip them.

Method.name: DelFileById
Method.Description:
Delete file from fileserver.
fileid - id of Fileserver.File.

Method.name: DelFile
Method.Description:
Delete file from fileserver.
fileid - id of Fileserver.File.

Method.name: UpdDir
Method.Description:
Update files from directory dir on fileserver.
rec - recursive: 1 - to update subfolders, 0 - so skip them.

Method.name: DiffList
Method.Description:
Finds diff between two lists.
old - original list.
new - modified list.
.added - list with all added elements (present in new list, absent in old list.
.deleted - list with all deleted elements (present in old list, absent in new list.

Method.name: ItsAllTheSameShit
Method.Implementation: #dim st As %Status = $$$OK set st=$$$OK set st=1

Method.name: FileListToJSON
Method.Description: Converts SQL query result to JSON.

Method.name: RequestFile
Method.Description: Custom user actions to get access to file.

Method.name: GenerateDownload
Method.Implementation: set download=##class(Fileserver.Download).%New() set download.DateCreated=$ZDATETIME($NOW(),3) set download.DateActiveUntil=$ZDATETIME(($PIECE($NOW(),",",1)+1)_","_$PIECE($NOW(),",",2),3) // Active for 24 hours set download.IP=%request.GetCgiEnv("REMOTE_ADDR") set download.File=##class(Fileserver.File).%OpenId(FileID) do download.DownloadIDGenerate() set DownloadID = download.DownloadID do download.%Save() kill download quit DownloadID

Method.name: DownloadFile
Method.Description: Check if user has a correct Fileserver.Download object, serve him his file.

Method.name: UploadFile
Method.Description: Check if user has a correct Fileserver.Download object, serve him his file.
